3#include "overload.hpp"
4#include "forEach.hpp"
5
6// world universal DECL macro:
7// NAMU_DECL is generalized API used to describe the metadata of
8// class in namu.
9// NAMU_DECL can be used to define detailed metadata about a class by chaining sub-command sets.
10// with NAMU macro, I can clarify that those INIT_META, VISIT are should be after of NAMU macro.
11// and limit the scope of availbility.
12// these macros which are available only inside of NAMU macro are called to sub-commands.
13//
14// Usage:
15// use NAMU_DECL macro at declaration of your class.
16//
17// class Foo {
18// NAMU_DECL(cmd1(arg1, arg2, ...), cmd2(arg1, arg2, ...), ...)
19//
20// public:
21// ...and your codes...
22// };
23
24#define _ON_EACH_DECL(cmd) __NAMU__DECL_##cmd
25#define NAMU(...) NAMU_EACH(_ON_EACH_DECL, __VA_ARGS__)
